      • getInstance

        public static ServerController getInstance()
        Server controller singleton constructor
        Returns:
        instance

      • resetGame

        protected void resetGame()
        This method handles the operation that happens to the server after a game starts. If there are not any players in the waiting room, it simply sets the active game to null, otherwise it handles the players moving from the waiting room to the active room.

      • removeGame

        protected void removeGame(Game game)
        This method removes a game from the active games and handles all the associated operations
        Parameters:
        game - game to be removed

      • disconnectPlayer

        This method disconnects a player from the server
        Parameters:
        player - to be disconnected
